GenerateText.summary: Generates text using a text template.

Generate1.summary: Generates a merged output file from the specified template and data file.

Generate2.summary: Generates a merged output file from the specified template and Sections data.

Generate3.summary: Generates a merged output file from the template lines and Sections data.

GenSection.summary: Generates each RepeatItem in a section.
GenSection.remarks: If the Section is null, then generates each line till a Section is encountered. This method is recursively called from GenRepeatItem if a nested section is encountered.

GenRepeatItem.summary: Generates the code for the current RepeatItem.
GenRepeatItem.param: Indicates if this is the last RepeatItem.

GenIfBegin.param: Indicates if this is the last RepeatItem.

ReplaceValues.summary: Replaces the values for the active RepeateItems.

ActiveSessionReplacementValue.summary: Retrieves the active session replacement value.
ActiveSessionReplacementValue.returns: The replacement value if available, otherwise null.

ActiveSessionRepeateItems.summary: Retrieves the active session current repeat items.
ActiveSessionRepeateItems.returns: The collection of active repeat items.

PushSection.summary: Pushes the current Section object on the Active stack.

PopSection.summary: Pops the completed Section off of the Active stack.

GetDirective.summary: Checks the line for a directive and returns the directive name and value.

IsSectionDirective.summary: Checks for a valid SectionBegin or SectionEnd directive.
IsSectionDirective.returns: True if a valid SectionBegin or SectionEnd directive otherwise false.
